ygData.subject: Qeynos monks rejoice
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings brothers and sisters, I do not know if all have been made aware of this, but it seems to be in the Ashen Order s interest to have the Deathfist Orcs
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings brothers and sisters,

I do not know if all have been made aware of this, but it seems to be in the
Ashen Order's interest to have the Deathfist Orcs of the commons erradicated.
Now, all victories over the orcs of the Deathfist clan increases the esteem
with which you are held by the Ashen Order. May Quellious guide you all in
your
journey.

In Quellious's name,

Manjushri
Bearer of the Orange Sash of the Ashen Order
(Fennin Ro)

*OOC* I'm not sure which of the last two patches did it, but after the last
patch, Orc's in East and West Commons improved faction with the Ashen Order as
well as the other usual faction adjustments (These are the things you discover
when you save a life from a rampand Orc Legionnaire). Now, I am finally
regarded with greater esteem in my own guild than by the monks of the Silent
Fist in Qeynos (I have bested a great many gnolls, so I was well liked in
Qeynos : ).

---------------------------------------------------
John N. Mosqueda
The General Libraries
University of Texas at Austin
Voice: (512) 495-4286
E-mail: mosquito@...
